item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 14th January 2014 at The Central Leeds
item.description: After the roaring success of the second meet up we thought we'd do it all again. But before the details, we said it on twitter but we'll say it again - THANK YOU to... Andy Burgin from MadeByPi for the DevopsDays presentation. John Denholm from SkyBet for the insight into how DevOps has has been implemented to deliver business value. SkyBet for "Tab50" - big thank you for the beers.
